plot: Miranda is a curious girl, whose only goal in life is learning to fly. After a long series of unsuccessful attempts, either by their parents as by physical laws, finally she will find her own way to raise flight.
title: El vuelo de Miranda
plot_es: Miranda is a curious girl, whose only goal in life is learning to fly. After a long series of unsuccessful attempts, either by their parents as by physical laws, finally she will find her own way to raise flight.
plot_en: Miranda is a curious girl, whose only goal in life is learning to fly. After a long series of unsuccessful attempts, either by their parents as by physical laws, finally she will find her own way to raise flight.
